eeta ekathu karana lada thorathuru ma liyana blog satahanin ekathu karana lada wuwath, eeta anumathiya mehi yoda ganimata wikipidiyawen dena awasarayata idak laba ganimata pera mese wenath sinhala blog adawiyaka liyu mage pudgalika prathicharayak methanata anda ganimin kiyana mugdha wadan dodana shwetha wisin wikipidiyawe gaurawaya nathi karayi.

ee, anuwa siddhiya sambandhayen bandhanagara buddhi ansha niladharin saha magasin bandhanagara adhikariwarayage mulikathwayen da wishesha wimarshana kriyathmaka bawa bandhanagara madhya prakashaka, bandhanagara komasaris thushara upuldeniya mahatha sandahan kaleya.
ekak wanne, atham niladharin hamuda nithiya saha winaya kada karamin athurudahan karawime barapathala aparadhaya thaman wihinma sidu kirimayi.

jathika godanangili paryeshana sanwidhanaye jyeshta paryeshana widyagnya ech.di.es. premasiri mahatha pawasanne mahanuwara, kolambaa basnawathuma hewath ‘gudshed’ bas nawathume pawathina wayu dushana thaththwaya loka saukhya sanwidhanaye uparima wayu dushana pramithi mattamata wada boho wadi bawayi.
eheth niwana wisthara karanna baha.
karunarathnath watapita balana gaman hodatama hina una.
panthiye prifektwa thoranna panthi bhara guruthumiya ticharla atharayi lamayi atharayi chandayak thibba.
apita balan innayi thiyenne.
ada mema madhya hamuwata mema amathyanshaye nagenahira aasiya saha pasifik anshaye niladharin saha batahira anshaye niladhariniyak sahabhagi wenawa.
umbaa baya nowi idapanko..
ane meh loku ayiye, mata raniluth kariya, mayithrith kariya, mahindath kariya.

mamath issarahata gihin thanaka nawathuna..ethana shit eke idiye tikak tharuna amma kenekuyi,thaththa kenekuyi chuti puthayi.putha idiye thaththage odokkuwata oluwa thiyagena ammage paththata kakul dagena..okkoma nidi..oya athare tika durak yanakota puthata aharuna.watapita baluwama ammayi thaththayi dennama nidi..

prawina teli natya adhyaksha nalan mendis mahatha shri lanka ekdina krikat ithihasaya namin krikat pothak elidakwimata sudanamin sitiyi.mita pera 90 dashakaya agabhagaye di shri lanka ekdina krikat ithihasaya namin siya palamu krikat potha elidakwu mendis mahatha mewara idiripath kirimata niyamithawa aththe ehi dewani kotasaya.
aanduwa asamath kiyamu.

me samaja sanwidhanawalin pasal yana wayase daksha, nayakathwayata sudusu hakiyawak thiyena aya thoragena mona deshapalana pakshayakin wunath kamak naha hari eyalawa nayakayo karanna wadasatahan diyath karanna.
kokakola walina pahadiliwama saukhya haniyak wenawa.
samanga 16 ingrisi sita rasayana widyawa dakwa departhamenthu, ema widyalaye patamala rashiyak idiripath karayi :
ema awasthawedi parlimenthuwe dadi ghoshakari thaththwayak udgatha wiya.
madhyawedinta saha madhya aayathanawalata ella kala mara prahara amathakada...

sirasa madhya jalaye sabhapathi raja mahendran mahathata erehiwa mathara disthrik parlimenthu manthri mangala samarawira mahatha pawara thibu naduwa badada (11) paswaruwe mathara mahesthrath saha athireka disa winisuru manjula sampath karunarathna mahatha wisin nishprabha kaleya.
ewani disthrikkayak yuddhayen adu lesa pida windi emen pas gunayakata aasanna janagahanayak athi monaragala ha sansandanaya kala yuththe lunu abindak samangaya.
praktis enna awashya nane eyata akt karannath direkt karannath dekama puluwanne.” “ee kiyanne api dan karana kisi deyak wenas karanne na?…” “awashya naha kiyalayi mama hithanne.
kasala arbudaya sambandhayen prashna kirima sandaha janathawa paminethayi danagath wahama jon amarathunga amathyawaraya wisin ema pradeshiya sambandhikarana kamituwa awalangu kara atha.
hamuda kumanthranayata ekwanne athishaya wishwasawantha ha rahasigatha pirisaki.
pahadiliwama jayagrahi mawathe inne maithri.
ewani de kirimata yama eetath wadiya anuwana kriyawaki, oba obage wimukthiya sewimata yanne bahutharayak karanadeyak kirimen nam, mata oba ketharam buddhimathda kiya therumgatha haka.
ee wiwidhathwaya atham niwarthana kalapiya sagarawalata da wada ihala we.
dan obath kujitha wi awasanayi !!!! .....

kalayak yaddi sayibar yaye ee hitha mithuru paradisaya api hamogema jiwitha walata nathuwama bari thanak wuna.kawadawathma sajiwiwa dakala nathi , katha karala nothibunu api langama inna nayanta yaluwanta sahodarayanta wada lengathu bandimakin baduna.ee wenakota numbaayi mamayith yam tharamakata samipa wela hitiye.katha baha dadi wunata , dadabbara wunata numbae hithe mama gana punchi lathen bawak thiyena bawa mata awabodha wuna.ee wenakota mama unmanthikawak wage eyata prema karanna patan aran.eyath ehemayi.ee hitha man wenuwen adana bawa walapena bawa mamath danagena hitiya.eeth kawadawath api apita aadare karana bawa pennuwe na...

ee kathawa da guruwaru apita gahuwe naththan api dan inna oone hireya, shishyathwa wibhagaya yanu demawpiyange wibhagayakya yanadi washayen janapa්riya ha sthapitha wi aththa wu janapa්riya ha pa්rakata katha wagema wichara buddhiyakin thorawa waladagena aththa wu mithyawaki.
diyamanthi muddak dagena hitiye,
“ehema wenne na..
